      • init

public void init()

      • customRssForJob

        public String customRssForJob(int jobId,
                     int num,
                     String type,
                     String keywordsForTaggingAsString)
                       throws ParserConfigurationException,
                              TransformerException,
                              ParseException
        Returns job data as custom RSS (Digital Schladming).
        Parameters:
        jobId - database ID of the job
        num - number of data items to return
        type - only return data of that type
        keywordsForTaggingAsString - words to use for tagging in query_word
        Returns:
        RSS stream as java String
        Throws:
        ParserConfigurationException
        TransformerException
        ParseException

      • customRssForPlugin

        public String customRssForPlugin(String pluginName,
                        int num,
                        String type,
                        String keywordsForTaggingAsString)
                          throws ParserConfigurationException,
                                 TransformerException,
                                 ParseException
        Returns plugin data as custom RSS (Digital Schladming).
        Parameters:
        pluginName - name of the plugin
        num - number of data items to return
        type - only return data of that type
        keywordsForTaggingAsString - words to use for tagging in query_word
        Returns:
        RSS stream as java String
        Throws:
        ParserConfigurationException
        TransformerException
        ParseException

      • sadDataToCustomRss

        public String sadDataToCustomRss(ArrayList<SADJobData> jobData,
                        String type,
                        String keywordsForTaggingAsString,
                        String href)
                          throws ParserConfigurationException,
                                 ParseException,
                                 TransformerException
        Converts SAD job data in the database to a custom RSS feed for Digital Schladming experiment.
        Parameters:
        jobData - data entries.
        type - data type.
        keywordsForTaggingAsString - keywords for tagging.
        href - RSS href parameter value.
        Returns:
        custom RSS feed for Digital Schladming experiment
        Throws:
        ParserConfigurationException
        ParseException
        TransformerException

      • sadDataToSchladmingTwitterRss

        public String sadDataToSchladmingTwitterRss(ArrayList<SADJobData> data,
                                   String keywordsForTaggingAsString,
                                   String href)
                                     throws ParserConfigurationException,
                                            ParseException,
                                            TransformerException
        Creates custom Twitter RSS feed for Digital Schladming experiment.
        Parameters:
        data - data entries.
        keywordsForTaggingAsString - keywords for tagging.
        href - RSS href parameter value.
        Returns:
        custom Twitter RSS feed for Digital Schladming experiment.
        Throws:
        ParserConfigurationException
        ParseException
        TransformerException
